select mi.id, mi.user_id, mi.content, mi.status, mi.create_date, ui.code, ui.name, ui.images, ui.phone, ui.email from message_info mi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = mi.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{messageInfo.code},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{messageInfo.name},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{messageInfo.userId}
order by mi.create_date desc
